reviews.review: 玩个游戏觉得自己好像很厉害的样子是怎么回事！

I kept neglecting “Portal 2” in my library for the longest time, often wondering why I bought it in the first place, thinking to myself “how could a puzzle game possibly pique my interest” (while smugly taking another sip of tea). Yes, I had completely missed out on all the hype and then only started playing it because of a friend. Well, as it turns out, this puzzle game is pretty good. “Portal 2” bristles with creativity and has some insanely funny characters brought to life by amazing voice actors (it's J.K. Simmons for heaven's sake). At the same time, the game also has one of these eerie sci-fi settings that Valve used to be so good at creating and which once again is presented beautifully and effectively in the Source engine. If I have any complaint at all, it would be that the singleplayer part feels like it's a bit on the short side. But that’s probably only because I didn’t want it to end at all. Luckily, there is also an exciting co-op mode, which is best enjoyed with a friend with whom you can voice chat.

+ Good narrative with a lot of jokes & humors
+ Puzzles that will make you use your brain power and increase your IQ
+ Interesting gravity related physics

- Movement is too slow
- Objectives aren't clear
- Portal gun can be used on some specific walls which are hard to spot sometimes

I can only recommend this game to anyone who likes puzzle games. This is one of the best ever made of all times.

Все лучшее, что было в первой части бережно сохранили, приправив все это еще множеством нововведений (взаимодействие с гелями и другими новыми устройствами). Ясное дело, игра превосходит оригинал по уровню графики и другими техническими возможностями, но не отметить работу над музыкальной составляющей будет непростительной ошибкой с моей стороны — музыке в Portal 2 уделено особое внимание, она завораживает.
Этой тот случай, когда сиквел превосходит оригинал:
1. Увеличенная продолжительность (основной сюжетной линии) раза в 2.
2. Головокружительные головоломки.
3. Особый юмор (куда же без него:)).
4. Олтичный сюжет.
5. Приятный геймплей и незабываемая атмосфера.
Все, что доктор прописал для фанатов вселенной Half-Life:)

One of my favorite games of all time, its also my favorite puzzle game, coop really improved the whole experience, this is the ideal sequel to a game, pick the first game, see how good and simple it is, now get the sequel, see how bigger and better it become, such amazing games, portal 1 &2 are must-have to every steam user.

I've just replayed this recently, the campaign is still fun, although I felt that this time the last act kinda overstayed its welcome but still a great game anyway, and I finally finished the coop and played some of the custom community maps, all of this whole experience was great and theres nothing like it in the whole market, portal 2 is my favorite puzzle game ever and nothing will come close to it.

Gelelim muhteşem bir oyunun daha sonuna..

Portal 1'i oynadığım zaman ''bu nasıl bir oyun lan?'' dediğimi hatırlıyorum. Oyunu hiç sevmemiştim. Grafikleri gerçekten kötüydü. Portal 2'yi satın almamın sebebi multiplayer modunun olmasıydı aslında. Markette trailer'ını izlediğimde 1. oyuna nazaran çok daha iyi olduğunu görmüştüm. Eğer singleplayer olsaydı kesinlikle almazdım ama şimdi iyiki almışım diyorum. Oyunun Multiplayer'ı Single'ın devamı gibi aslında. Ben ilk Multiplayer oynayıp bitirdikten ve sevdikten sonra Single'da nasıldır diye merak edip başladım. O yüzden ilk sonraki kısmı ardından başlangıcı oynamam biraz değişik oldu.

Oyuna ilk başladığımda biraz şaşırdım. Çünkü benim için çok hızlı ilerlemişti. Başta bunu da pek beğenmemek ile birlikte oynamaya devam ettim. İyiki de etmişim.

Oyundan bahsedecek olursak; -zaten artık bilmeyen yoktur-
Oyun aslında test odaları üzerinden devam ediyor başta. Elinizde ki portal silahı ile odaları ve bulmacaları geçmeye çalışıyorsunuz. Sonra bi anda kendinizi buradan kaçarken buluyorsunuz. Wheatley adında bir robot sizin kaçmanıza yardım ediyor ve test odalarını yöneten ''GLaDOS'' isimli robot ise sizi durdurmaya çalışıyor. Ardından GLaDOS'u devre dışı bırakıp yönetici olarak Wheatley'i bağlıyorsunuz ve hayatınızın hatasını yapıyorsunuz. :D Asıl macera bundan sonra başlıyor.

Multiplayer modunda ise arkadaşınız ile birlikte denek olarak kullanılacak insanları serbest bırakmaya çalışıyorsunuz. (burada yanlışım olabilir) 

Herneyse oyun bu şekilde devam ediyor.

Portal 2'yi bitirdikten sonra beğenmediğim halde içimden 1. oyunuda bitirmek geldi. Yine bitirmeye sondan başladım. :D

Hikayesi gerçekten güzel ve zaman geçirmek için ideal bir oyun. Oyunu oynarken sıkılacağınızı düşünmüyorum aslında. Ben başlarda biraz sıkıldım fakat oyun ilerledikçe güzelleşiyor ve beyninizi yakmaya devam ediyor. Son kısım biraz eğlenceli ve karmaşık gibi. Benim en beğendiğim ve eğlendiğim yer Chapter 9'du. 

Herneyse dediğim gibi oyun gayet güzel. Herkese oynamasını tavsiye edeceğim bir oyundur. Oynarsanız pişman olmazsınız. Ve biraz beyniniz yanabilir. :D

Ve son olarak; GLaDOS adamdır!

Sizlere iyi oyunlar, benim acilen gidip 1. oyunu bitirmem gerek. :D

Portal 2 is a First Person Perspective mash of puzzle game and First Person Shooter made abd published by Valve. It is a sequel to acclaimed by critics Portal from 2007. Until now the game was released so far on PC with Windows, Linux and OS X, Playstation 3 and Xbox 360. Maybe it is just my imagination but I think being a real gamer and not hearing at peast once about this franchise is nearly impossible.

The plot continoues story of Chell, our mute protagonist after events of the first Portal is still imprisoned in Aperture's facility, this time however she has a new companion, the AI named Wheatley. During they desperate struggle to escape they accidentaly revive GLaDOS, the AI overseeing the entire project. Once again the villainous machine force us to solve puzzles and proceed through test chambers in order to survive. The story is preety great in my opinion, thanks to side characters that can be funny yet convincing all the time really make you enjoy everything, also it has some shocking plot twists and really satisfying ending.
Just as in previous game Chell is armed with the iconic Portal Gun that can create portals on white surfaces, allowing us to move around on very creative ways. Developers also cared to add some new mechanics including pushing streams and various gels boosting our speed or height of jumps. Turrets, buttons etc. The level design often force us to think over all the movements, the solutions are not always obvious so you can spend even an hour in one chamber just on trying out what works and what not.
Soundtrack is not only enjoyable, but also it reacts to what player does. If you walk on orange gel for example the music speeds up for a while, it really adds some immerse to the gameplay.
The game has it's years so at least on modern PCs you can expect flawless performance, frames does not fall ever below 60 on highest settings, besides graphics still look great.

To be honest this is propably the one of the most intense puzzle games you can find on Steam today, story does not dissapoint, gameplay require a lot of thinking, the music fits great and it is all still enjoyable despite the years. If like me you have grown on classic Tomb Raiders or other games that challenge your way of thinking you will enjoy it so much. 10/10.

Наверное нигде, кроме первого Fallout, не было такого количества мрачной иронии и язвительного юмора, которые не исчезают даже на финальных титрах. Русская локализация бесподобна, ваши антагонисты живы настолько, насколько вообще может быть одушевлена робототехника: от маниакального рева Уитли до флегматичного ГЛАДОС'овского "ты чудовище"– все это не раз заставит вас улыбаться или просто откровенно ржать. И этот театр двух чокнутых роботов тем уморительней, что главной героине за обе части не суждено вымолвить и слова.
I love it if your a problem solver you well love this game all rate this game 12/10

Sequel to the first Portal game (2007), this is probably one of the greater singleplayer/multiplayer games you will experience. I've bought this game maybe three times and it is absolutely the most fun I've ever and will ever have with portals. The singleplayer story alone is a major reason why you should just play the game, because it's what all the hype lived up for (and still lives up for to this day). The multiplayer for this game is also fantastic, with you being able to play with a partner and help each other solve puzzles (which admittingly are harder than the ones in the main story), while there *also* being a story for co-op. And even if you finish both the co-op missions and singleplayer, there is still a community who continues to make seperate puzzles and even mini storylines of puzzles for you to survive through. 
You might want to play through Portal in order to understand the story a bit more fully, but it isn't necessary. You'll make some great memories (and references) with this game!
I love Portal. It is a quirky game, but very fun and challenging at times.

Игры в современном мире стали как фильмы: с четко прописанным сюжетом, пасхалками, отличной актерской озвучкой. Портал 2 - не ислючение, игра захватывает с начала и до конца, я прошел игру за 2 дня (одиночная сюжетная линия), в сумме потратил около 10 часов, все время между окончанием игры в первый день и началом игры во второй, думал о сюжете, настолько затянуло и заинтересовало. В моменты веселые хотелось смеятся, в  грустные - наоборот, Портал пробивал эмоции, а разве не это залог прекрасной игры. Не пожвлел ни одной минуты проведенной в игре. Всем кто еще не прошел, советую пройте обязательно.

Ta gra będzie popularna jeszcze przez wiele lat. Wielkim plusem tej gry jest że pójdzie nawet na słabszych komputerach.
